ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
attrs is the Python package that will bring back the joy of writing
classes by relieving you from the drudgery of implementing object
protocols (aka dunder methods). Its main goal is to help you to write
concise and correct software without slowing down your code. For that, it
gives you a class decorator and a way to declaratively define the
attributes on that class:
about.summary: attrs is the Python package that will bring back the joy of writing classes by relieving you from the drudgery of implementing object protocols (aka dunder methods).

about.description:
attrs is the Python package that will bring back the joy of writing
classes by relieving you from the drudgery of implementing object
protocols (aka dunder methods). Its main goal is to help you to write
concise and correct software without slowing down your code. For that, it
gives you a class decorator and a way to declaratively define the
attributes on that class:
about.summary: attrs is the Python package that will bring back the joy of writing classes by relieving you from the drudgery of implementing object protocols (aka dunder methods).

name: attrs
raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: attrs
  version: "25.4.0"
  sha256: 16d5969b87f0859ef33a48b35d55ac1be6e42ae49d5e853b597db70c35c57e11

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ${{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: "python -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python ${{ python_min }}.*
    - hatchling
    - hatch-vcs
    - hatch-fancy-pypi-readme
  run:
    - python >=${{ python_min }}

tests:
  - python:
      python_version: ${{ python_min }}.*
      imports:
        - attr
      pip_check: true

about:
  homepage: https://attrs.readthedocs.io/en/stable/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: attrs is the Python package that will bring back the joy of writing classes by relieving you from the drudgery of implementing object protocols (aka dunder methods).
  description: |
    attrs is the Python package that will bring back the joy of writing
    classes by relieving you from the drudgery of implementing object
    protocols (aka dunder methods). Its main goal is to help you to write
    concise and correct software without slowing down your code. For that, it
    gives you a class decorator and a way to declaratively define the
    attributes on that class:
  documentation: https://attrs.readthedocs.io/en/stable/
  repository: https://github.com/python-attrs/attrs

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - CJ-Wright
    - licode
    - nicoddemus
    - jochym
